content.html: My mom just turned to me and said, “I hope I never get Alzheimer’s.” I put my arm around her and said, “If you get it, I promise to take care of you, and love you through it.” ... She has had #Alzheimers for years 😭😩😢💔
content.value:
My mom just turned to me and said, “I hope I never get Alzheimer’s.”

I put my arm around her and said, “If you get it, I promise to take care of you, and love you through it.”

...

She has had #Alzheimers for years 😭😩😢💔
